artist: Artist: John Porcellino; Publisher: Spit and a Half , San Francisco
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanic image of palm tree, designs, and text printed in offset lithography on wove paper covers; 34 pp.
inscription: P. 1, blue ink pen: to fly! / John P.
title: King-Cat Comics, no. 63
